headline: Comcast Donates $50,000 to San Bruno Education Foundation (SBEF) to Support the Advancement of Digital Opportunities
summary: Contribution Underscores Comcast's Commitment to the San Bruno Community SAN BRUNO, CA / ACCESS Newswire / August 22, 2025 / Comcast announced a $50,000 donation to the San Bruno Education Foundation during a community barbecue on Aug. 22. The funding ...
